original_text: They were delighted to hear this and promised to give him money. So he watched for an opportunity to hand him over.
korean_text: 그들이 듣고 기뻐하여 돈을 주기로 약속하니 유다가 예수를 어떻게 넘겨 줄까 하고 그 기회를 찾더라

sentences.original_text: They were delighted to hear this
and promised to give him money
So he watched for an opportunity
